meanings.definition: Constituting number eight in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: She won the eighth place in the race.
meanings.sent2: The eighth day of the week is Sunday.
meanings.sent3: The eighth cookie in the jar was secretly the best.
meanings.sent4: His eighth attempt at solving the puzzle finally succeeded.
meanings.sent5: The eighth star in the sky shone the brightest.

meanings.definition: One of eight equal parts of a whole.
meanings.sent1: She ate an eighth of the pizza.
meanings.sent2: The cake was divided into eighths for sharing.
meanings.sent3: He found the eighth piece of the puzzle hidden under the table.
meanings.sent4: The eighth of the treasure map led to a hidden cave.
meanings.sent5: The eighth of the rainbow was the most vibrant.

meanings.definition: The eighth tone in a diatonic musical scale.
meanings.sent1: The melody ended on the eighth note.
meanings.sent2: In the song, the eighth tone was the most uplifting.
meanings.sent3: The eighth key on the piano always sounded a bit off.
meanings.sent4: Her voice reached the eighth pitch effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The eighth chord in the composition added a touch of magic.
